About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. Reference assistance available by mail.

About.Access: Minimum age 16 years. 2 weeks' advance notice required.

About.Acquisition focus: Historical development of the district Council into a town and eventually a City (1850's-1992).

About.Major holdings: City of Brighton Minutes 1854-1992 Photographs 1850-1992 Cemetery Books 1850-1992
